definition: Cristóbal Colón or Christopher Columbus (1451-1506)/Columbus, capital of Ohio
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: This event long antedates the arrival of Columbus in America.
sentences.chinese: 这件事的发生远在哥伦布到达美洲之前。

sentences.english: A lot of people make sure that they visit it when they come here.
sentences.chinese: 很多来这里游玩的人都一定会去哥伦布环岛。

sentences.english: People used to give credit Columbus for the discovery of the New Continent.
sentences.chinese: 人们过去把发现新大陆的功劳归之于哥伦布。

sentences.english: and at that time Columbus Circle was very dirty.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，哥伦布环岛这儿还很脏。

sentences.english: Did you know Christopher Columbus was from here?
sentences.chinese: 你们知道哥伦布是吉诺瓦人吗？

sentences.english: We are now boarding all rows on Flight 1234 to Columbus.
sentences.chinese: 现在所有乘坐飞往哥伦布第1234航班的乘客登机。
哥伦布在1492年发现了美洲。
哥伦布日在哪一天庆祝？

sentences.english: Columbus Day became a U.S. holiday in 1971.
sentences.chinese: 哥伦布日在1971年成为美国假日。

sentences.english: Have you ever done any adventures like Columbus did?
sentences.chinese: 你曾像哥伦布那样冒过险吗？

sentences.english: They were pround, conceited fellows, and they very soon began to try to make Columbus uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 他们全是傲慢自大的人，很快就使哥伦布感到不快。

sentences.english: Columbus kept a careful and detailed chronicle of his voyages.
sentences.chinese: 哥伦布按序仔而详尽次航程。

sentences.english: You know, Tallahassee and Columbus are both, uh, east.
sentences.chinese: 你看，那个，塔拉哈西和哥伦布，都在，呃，东边。

sentences.english: It was 1491. Columbus was to reach America a year later.
sentences.chinese: 那是1491年，一年后哥伦布达到了美洲。
1494年的今天，哥伦布登陆牙买加。

sentences.english: The islands were discovered by Columbus in 1503.
sentences.chinese: 这些岛屿由哥伦布于1503年发现。

definition: Captain James Cook (1728-1779), British navigator and explorer
the New World/the Americas as opposed to the Old World 舊大陸|旧大陆[jiu4 da4 lu4] or Eurasia
the Americas/North and South American continents
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Santiago, capital of Chile/San Diego, California
variant of 拿破崙|拿破仑[Na2 po4 lun2]
